page.title: 06Cryals Farm Matfield
page.content: This is a fruit farm of 75 acres growing apples, mainly Cox,some Bramleys and a few red varieties for pollination.5 men and 1 woman are employed full time,3 or 4 more are emloyed in the packhouse and 20_24 seasonal workers pick the fruit. {Each year about 1200_1500 new fruit {trees are planted}To irrigate the crop several reservoirs have been built. These also improve the landscape and povide new environments for wildlife. { Machines}are used here to{collect {the fruit.}4 machines move along the rows,pickers place fruit on conveyors extending on all sides,the apples roll gently into bulk bins. Sizing and grading are described on page 3 but here sizing is by weight. The National Farmers Union contest for best fruit farm was won this year by Cryals Farm.
